00022 template <class WidgetType>
00023 class TControlledWidgetWrap: public WidgetType
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef WidgetType BaseClass;
00027 
00028        TControlledWidgetWrap(CGuiComponentBase& ownerComponent, QWidget* parent = NULL);
00029 
00030 protected:
00031        // reimplemented (QWidget)
00032        virtual void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* eventPtr);
00033 
00034 private:
00035        CGuiComponentBase& m_ownerComponent;

00043 :      BaseClass(parent),
00044        m_ownerComponent(ownerComponent)

00051 // reimplemented (QWidget)
00052 
00053 template <class WidgetType>
00054 void TControlledWidgetWrap<WidgetType>::closeEvent(QCloseEvent* eventPtr)
00055 {
00056        bool ignoreClose;
00057        m_ownerComponent.OnTryClose(&ignoreClose);
00058        if (ignoreClose){
00059               eventPtr->ignore();
00060        }
00061        else{
00062               eventPtr->accept();
00063        }
00064 }
